extensionDescription.message: Deletes history older than a specified amount of days.

optionDaysText.message: Number of Days to Keep History

optionDaysInfo.message: Delete history older than midnight on the specified number of days ago. Will have no effect if behavior is set to disabled or delete all. (Defaults to 0)

optionIdleLengthInfo.message: Amount of time in seconds the browser should idle before triggering. (Defaults to 60, Minimum 15)

optionTimerIntervalInfo.message: Interval in minutes between triggering. (Defaults to 1440 minutes or 24 hours, Minimum 1)

optionDeleteModeInfo.message: Whether the extension triggers on idle, on browser startup, or at a set interval. (Defaults to idle)

optionDeleteModeInfoManifestv3.message: Whether the extension triggers on on browser startup or at a set interval. (Defaults to timer)

optionNotificationsInfo.message: Request notifications permission using the below button, and then set the option to Show Notifications to enable notifications when history is deleted.

optionNotificationsInfoNew.message: Whether a notification should be shown when history is deleted.

optionIconInfo.message: Choose the extension's icon (Defaults to theme icon in Firefox. Defaults to circle gradient icon in Chrome. Theme icons are not supported in Chrome)

manualDeleteInfo.message: Press the button below to delete history manually.

notificationEnabledBody.message: Notifications will now appear when history is deleted

historyDeletedNotificationBody.message: History from before $END$ was deleted on $NOW$.

optionBehaviorInfo.message: Decides what history the extension should delete when it triggers.

behaviorDays.message: Delete history older than a specified number of days

optionFilterHistoryInfo.message: Whether to prevent certain sites from being deleted. If enabled, the total number of history items deleted will be counted.

optionFilterListInfo.message: A list of sites that will not be deleted. Filter History must be enabled for this to take effect. Every line should contain a hostname that will be excluded from deletion.

statisticsNextRunDisable.message: History will not be automatically cleared.

statisticsNextRunIdle.message: History will be cleared on browser idle.

statisticsNextRunStartup.message: History will be cleared on browser startup.

statisticsDeleteCountWarning.message: (History filtering must be enabled to track statistics)

lastRunNever.message: History has not been cleared yet.
